        Parameters:
        button - button that controlles keyboard keys pressings
        fuelConsumption - field in which the value of fuel consumption is displayed
        fuelLeft - field in which the value of fuel left is displayed
        height - field in which the value of height is displayed
        velocity - field in which the value of velocity is displayed
        time - field in which the value of time is displayed
        pane - field in which the value of fuel consumption is displayed
        anchorPane - pane that holds Rocket image
        returnButton - button that allows user to return to menu
        chart1 - chart that displays the data
        xAxis - chart X axis
        yAxis - chart Y axis
        playerName - player name
